item.description:
Join the Surfrider NH Chapter at the Portsmouth Gaslight on Friday Night, May 6th at 8:30PM in the upstairs lounge for a live band as well as surf shops Zapstix for a night of fun with a raffle. Surfrider will have information about Surfrider and will have Shirts, NHsurfrider wristbands and Surfwax for sale. There will be a raffle for a SURFBOARD and other surf swag.

**The Raffle will be drawn at MIDNIGHT and the event will go to approximately 12:30AM**

Cost: $8.00 cover charge

View the official poster here: http://files.meetup.com/737305/surfrider.jpg
item.why: have fun and raise money for a good cause
item.name: Surfrider Party Fundraiser at Portmouth Gaslight
